Sentencas: Electrochemical performance of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFC) is highly dependent on the spatial distribution of the reactant and product species.
Titulo: In-situ diagnosis and assessment of longitudinal current variation by electrode-segmentation method in anode-supported microtubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The structure degradation processes are also associated with the spatial quantities.
Titulo: In-situ diagnosis and assessment of longitudinal current variation by electrode-segmentation method in anode-supported microtubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In fact, spatially measured current variations provide profound information about the local processes.
Titulo: In-situ diagnosis and assessment of longitudinal current variation by electrode-segmentation method in anode-supported microtubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Due to the geometry of microtubular SOFCs (mt-SOFC), notable current variations can develop along the cells and cause temperature variations.
Titulo: In-situ diagnosis and assessment of longitudinal current variation by electrode-segmentation method in anode-supported microtubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: By applying the electrode-segmentation method, the longitudinal current variation is thus experimentally investigated in an anode-supported mt-SOFC for various cell voltage and fuel flow rates.
Titulo: In-situ diagnosis and assessment of longitudinal current variation by electrode-segmentation method in anode-supported microtubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: As a result, a remarkable current variation is shown among the segments for various flow rates.
Titulo: In-situ diagnosis and assessment of longitudinal current variation by electrode-segmentation method in anode-supported microtubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The current of the downstream segment rapidly decreases with the declining cell voltage implying the fuel starvation while the other segments continue to increase their currents.
Titulo: In-situ diagnosis and assessment of longitudinal current variation by electrode-segmentation method in anode-supported microtubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The conventional polarization curve drawn for the whole cell overlaps with the midstream polarization curve, considerably differing from the other segments.
Titulo: In-situ diagnosis and assessment of longitudinal current variation by electrode-segmentation method in anode-supported microtubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The higher N-2 flow rate with the identical H-2 flow enhances the overall performance.
Titulo: In-situ diagnosis and assessment of longitudinal current variation by electrode-segmentation method in anode-supported microtubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In comparison with the estimated practical power generation capacity of the whole cell, a notable performance-loss is found due to the inhomogeneity.
Titulo: In-situ diagnosis and assessment of longitudinal current variation by electrode-segmentation method in anode-supported microtubular solid oxide fuel cells
